text: kya tum isase dar gae ki apanee gupt vaarta se pahale sadaqe do? jo jab tumane yah na kiya aur allaah ne tumhen kshama kar diya. to namaaz qaayam karo, zakaat dete raho aur allaah aur usake rasool kee aagya ka paalan karo. aur tum jo kuchh bhee karate ho allaah usakee pooree khabar rakhata hai
